Nominees: The National Film Board of Canada
Citation: To the National Film Board of Canada in recognition of its 50th anniversary and its dedicated commitment to originate artistic, creative and technological activity and excellence in every area of film making.
To Eastman Kodak Company in recognition of the company's fundamental contributions to the art of motion pictures during the first century of film history.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Academy Award of Merit)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Academy Award of Merit)
Citation: To RAY DOLBY and IOAN ALLEN of Dolby Laboratories Incorporated for their continuous contributions to motion picture sound through the research and development programs of Dolby Laboratories.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Citation: To ROY W. EDWARDS and the ENGINEERING STAFF OF PHOTO-SONICS, INCORPORATED for the design and development of the Photo-Sonics 35mm-4ER High-Speed Motion Picture Camera with Reflex Viewing and Video Assist.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Citation: To the ARNOLD & RICHTER ENGINEERING STAFF, OTTO BLASCHEK and ARRIFLEX CORPORATION for the concept and engineering of the Arriflex 35-3 Motion Picture Camera.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
Nominees: Bill Tondreau|Alvah Miller|Paul Johnson|Peter A. Regla|Dan Slater|Bud Elam|Joe Parker|Bill Bryan|Jerry Jeffress|Ray Feeney|Bill Holland|Kris Brown
Citation: To BILL TONDREAU of Tondreau Systems / to ALVAH MILLER and PAUL JOHNSON of Lynx Robotics / to PETER A. REGLA of Elicon / to DAN SLATER / to BUD ELAM, JOE PARKER and BILL BRYAN of Interactive Motion Control / and to JERRY JEFFRESS, RAY FEENEY, BILL HOLLAND and KRIS BROWN for their individual contributions and the collective advancements they have brought to the motion picture industry in the field of motion control technology.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To GRANT LOUCKS of Alan Gordon Enterprises Incorporated for the design concept, and to GEOFFREY H. WILLIAMSON of Wilcam for the mechanical and electrical engineering, of the Image 300 35mm High-Speed Motion Picture Camera.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To MICHAEL V. CHEWEY, III for the development of the motion picture industry's first paper tape reader incorporating microprocessor technology.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To BHP, INC., successor to the Bell & Howell Professional Equipment Division, for the development of a high-speed reader incorporating microprocessor technology for motion picture laboratories.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To HOLLYWOOD FILM COMPANY for the development of a high-speed reader incorporating microprocessor technology for motion picture laboratories.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To BRUCE W. KELLER and MANFRED G. MICHELSON of Technical Film Systems for the design and development of a high-speed light valve controller and constant current power supply for motion picture laboratories.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To DR. ANTAL LISZIEWICZ and GLENN M. BERGGREN of ISCO-OPTIC GmbH for the design and development of the Ultra-Star series of motion picture lenses.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Nominees: James K. Branch|William L. Blowers|Nasir J. Zaidi
Citation: To JAMES K. BRANCH of Spectra Cine, Incorporated, and to WILLIAM L. BLOWERS and NASIR J. ZAIDI for the design and development of the Spectra CineSpot one-degree spotmeter for measuring the brightness of motion picture screens.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To BOB BADAMI, DICK BERNSTEIN and BILL BERNSTEIN of Offbeat Systems for the design and development of the Streamline Scoring System, Mark IV, for motion picture music editing.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To GARY ZELLER of Zeller International Limited for the development of Zel-Jel fire protection barrier for motion picture stunt work.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To EMANUEL TRILLING of Trilling Resources Limited for the development of Stunt-Gel fire protection barrier for motion picture stunt work.

CanonicalCategory: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Category: SCIENTIFIC OR TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
Citation: To PAUL A. ROOS for the invention of a method known as Video Assist, whereby a scene being photographed on motion picture film can be viewed on a monitor and/or recorded on video tape.
